ToolBar Class Reference

#include <ToolBar.h>

Inheritance diagram for ToolBar:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Works with ToolManager and ToolDock to provide a dockable window in which buttons can be placed.

Public Member Functions

AButton * ToolBar::MakeButton ( teBmps  eUp,
teBmps  eDown,
teBmps  eHilite,
teBmps  eStandard,
teBmps  eDisabled,
wxWindowID  id,
wxPoint  placement,
bool  processdownevents,
wxSize  size 
) [protected]

Makes a button and its four different state bitmaps

Parameters:
eUp Background for when button is Up.
eDown Background for when button is Down.
eHilite Background for when button is Hilit.
eStandard Foreground when enabled.
eDisabled Foreground when disabled.
id Windows Id.
placement Placement position
processdownevents true iff button handles down events.
size Size of the background.
